verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) — [ARG1: Final preparations] [V: are] [ARG2: underway] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [C-ARG1: for Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , including a plan for the leaders

SINGAPORE ( AP ) — [ARG2: Final preparations] are underway in Singapore for [ARG2: Tuesday 's historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [V: including] [ARG1: a plan for the leaders]
